类 ConsumerZooKeeper.ZKLoadRebalanceListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.taobao.metamorphosis.client.consumer.ConsumerZooKeeper.ZKLoadRebalanceListener
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.I0Itec.zkclient.IZkChildListener
    封闭类:
    ConsumerZooKeeper

    public class ConsumerZooKeeper.ZKLoadRebalanceListener
extends Object
implements org.I0Itec.zkclient.IZkChildListener
    Consumer load balance listener for zookeeper. This is a internal class for consumer,you should not use it directly in your code.
    作者:
    dennis
